I am trying to cancel the inverses on both sides of the goal so I can just apply the triangle inequality later.

n: ℕ
rg: fin n → ℝ
a: ℝ
ha: a ≠ 0
h_maybe_not_needed: 0 ≤ |a|
⊢ ‖r + g‖ * |a|⁻¹ ≤ (‖r‖ + ‖g‖) * |a|⁻¹

I would have thought there is sometime built-in that i can use to cancel the inverses but haven't been able to find one. Any help will be much appreciated.
